## useTrackToggle() function


**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useTrackToggle<T extends ToggleSource>({ source, onChange, initialState, captureOptions, ...rest }: UseTrackToggleProps<T>): {

    enabled: boolean;
    pending: boolean;

};
```
